post_title: T206 Frank Smith (Chicago & Boston) OM PSA 5
post_content:
I have a family member in need (with medical bills and no insurance) and I will be offering up several of my T206 cards in the next several days. 

First up, is T206 [URL="https://imgur.com/a/dIQv3KC"]Frank Smith[/URL] (Chicago & Boston) Old Mill PSA 5. This particular card is not one you see very often in PSA 5 or better. $1100 with signature delivery required. Payment via PayPal gift or PayPal G&S and you pay the 4% fee. As soon as payment is made and clears, I will ship and provide tracking information the same day.  Click on the link for pictures. 

Selling board reference since I have been a member: Andrew T206. He paid PPG and was pleased with the T206 Titus transaction. 

MacRumors forum - Been an active member for almost 13 years with several thousands of dollars in sales and all with A+ feedback. Most recent was a 2024 MacBook Pro for $1100 via PPG. 

If interested, please send me a PM and I will get right back with you. 

[url]https://imgur.com/a/dIQv3KC[/url]
